item.title: Golf Rush
item.description: A golf game i made with my friend. I mostly focused on art but I have also done some programming & design.

item.title: Cardboard Box Model
item.description: I made this model with performance in mind. It’s purpose is to look as realistic as possible with a minimal amount of vertices.

item.title: Hazbin Galaxy Render
item.description: A galaxy of the Hazbin Hotel universe I made with the theme: Galaxy.

item.title: Wiggly Path Generator
item.description: For Golf Rush I was researching different ways to point out to players where the golfball is located. One of these experiments was inspired by the way Hogwarts Legacy points you to quests. With a generated curvy line moving towards the goal. It works by inputting some points to generate a simple bezier curve and then placing knots on that simple curve that are offset randomly along the normal. Then finally all the knots are connected by one last bezier curve.

item.title: Post Processing Shaders
item.description: A collection of some full screen shaders I made to improve the look of a game.
